CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.tharmonia_import_transaction_testout WITH (
    LOCATION = 'new_data/', DATA_SOURCE = [harmonia_test], FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
) AS SELECT id, JSON_VALUE(data, '$.TransactionCardFirst6') AS first6, data FROM dbo.harmonia_import_transaction_test WHERE id = 49094976;
